जोडकर लिखिए।

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"option":{"optionsLHS":[{"text":"सेब को रुमाल में बाँधकर","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","index":1,"$$hashKey":"object:1258"},{"text":"फल खाने का समय","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","index":2,"$$hashKey":"object:1259"},{"text":"एक सेब भी खाने","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","index":3,"$$hashKey":"object:1260"},{"text":"व्यापारियों की साख","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","index":4,"$$hashKey":"object:1290"}],"optionsRHS":[{"text":"मुझे दे दिया।","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","mapIndex":1},{"text":"प्रातः काल है।","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","mapIndex":2},{"text":"लायक नहीं था।","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","mapIndex":3},{"text":"बनी हुई थी।","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","mapIndex":4}],"questionCount":0},"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":5,"isShuffleOption":false,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"जोडकर लिखिए। ","title":"जोडकर लिखिए। ","board":"State (Karnataka)","medium":"Hindi","gradeLevel":["Class 10"],"subject":"Hindi","qlevel":"MEDIUM","category":"MTF"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":false,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
